_header: This worldly joy is only fantasy
_description: ‘Leaulte vault Richesse,’ on the Instability of Worldly Joy — one eight-line stanza (ababbcbc)

BodArcSelB24.First Lines:
This warldly Ioy Is onely fantasyof quhich non erdly wicht can be
                    content…
BodArcSelB24.Last Lines:
…Presume nocht gevin þat god has some bot lentWithin
                    schort tyme the quhiche he thinkis to name

                Edition.
         Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1995.

CULLl510.First Lines:
The warldlie Ioy is onlie fantesieQuhair of na eirdlie wicht can be
                    content…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…Preswme not gevin þat god hes to þe lentWithin
                    short tyme þe quhilk he thinkis to craiff

Banna.First Lines:
This warldis ioy is only bot fantesyoff quhilk non erdly wicht can
                    be content…
Banna.Last Lines:
…presome nocht gevin That god hes done bot lentWithin schort
                    tyme the quhilk he thinkis to craue
